General.Name: C.Q. Pharmaceutical Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: C.Q. Pharmaceutical Holding Co., Ltd. distributes pharmaceutical products. The company engages in the research, development, production, and investment for medical device in the pharmaceutical industry. It offers medicines, medical devices, Chinese herbal medicines, health care products, hospital sales, and commercial wholesale, retail chain; terminal distribution; warehousing logistics; and supply chain value-added services. In addition, the company provides medical care and health products for medical care, elderly care, and rehabilitation; operates and manages medical institutions. The company was formerly known as Southwest Branch of China Medicine Company. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Chongqing, China. C.Q. Pharmaceutical Holding Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chongqing Chemical & Pharmaceutical Holding Group Company.

2.Name: Mr. Tao  Yu
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
